[#horizon-boundary-distinctness_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-soil-pit-characterization-protocol-shapes:horizon-boundary-distinctness:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils horizon boundary distinctnesses codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils horizon boundary distinctnesses codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/d481c266-583c-59ff-a35f-f78be49f88f8[`Abrupt (5-20mm)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/09d19fbc-263b-5363-80cb-020a6fa6d721[`Clear (20-50mm)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/e1df4113-647e-5d84-b09e-bdf96df946ef[`Diffuse (>100mm)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/80e814f3-8675-5d1e-8a0e-53d749f8ccd6[`Gradual (50-100mm)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/cb70f545-edd0-5fe8-9f9d-b20ae68317ae[`Sharp (<5mm)`]
